reviewText: I thought that this movie was very warm and touching.  It kind of gives back any faith that you may have lost.
My husband enjoys this holiday movie.  Enjoyable for family viewing.
Item is as described and arrived quickly.
I saw this On Hulu and loved it, so ahd to ahve a copy. Very good movie about a Mother searching for a way to support herself and her 3 kids.

This movie is a nice Christmas movie.  It is a little low budget and far fetched but it is a lighthearted Christmas movie with a great story and ending.  I would recommend this movie to other Christmas movie fans like me.
I love this, its definitely a great movie to watch with the family at christmas time, something to add to the holiday movie collection.
Item unsealed and when opened found the wrong movie in it which was not the Christmas Path  but Beyond Chrismtas.  Will file claim.

I really enjoyed watching this. Makes you believe angels are watching over you. I will be giving this one repeat viewings. It gives you faith and hope. No matter what situation your life is in,always have faith.

This is a pleasant movie with a good-enough story.

Parents might want to be careful about letting children see this movie however, since one of the hidden messages is that it is okay to trust strangers who look like hoodlums or creeps.  This is a dangerous message to teach to children.

This was a nice movie. It makes you feel you really have a christmas angel watchin over you. Oh And the music they played in it was nice to i loved the movie everyone should buy and watch it. Especially around the holidays. Happy Holidays.
